trans-unit.source: Secure your web app using various means of authentication and authorization
trans-unit.target: Secure your web app using various means of authentication and authorization

trans-unit.source: Setup Azure Active Directory authentication for your app
trans-unit.target: Setup Azure Active Directory authentication for your app

trans-unit.source: Secure traffic to your app by enabling Transport Layer Security (TLS/SSL) - HTTPS
trans-unit.target: Secure traffic to your app by enabling Transport Layer Security (TLS/SSL) - HTTPS

trans-unit.source: Force all incoming traffic over HTTPS connection
trans-unit.target: Force all incoming traffic over HTTPS connection

trans-unit.source: Restrict access to your app by client's IP address
trans-unit.target: Restrict access to your app by client's IP address

trans-unit.source: Restrict access to your app by client's behavior - request frequency and concurrency
trans-unit.target: Restrict access to your app by client's behavior - request frequency and concurrency

trans-unit.source: Scan your web app code for vulnerabilities using Tinfoil Security Scanning
trans-unit.target: Scan your web app code for vulnerabilities using Tinfoil Security Scanning

trans-unit.source: Configure TLS mutual authentication to require client certificates to connect to your web app
trans-unit.target: Configure TLS mutual authentication to require client certificates to connect to your web app

trans-unit.source: Configure a client certificate for use from your app to securely connect to external resources
trans-unit.target: Configure a client certificate for use from your app to securely connect to external resources

trans-unit.source: Remove standard server headers to avoid tools from fingerprinting your app
trans-unit.target: Remove standard server headers to avoid tools from fingerprinting your app

trans-unit.source: Securely connect your app with resources in a private network using Point-To-Site VPN
trans-unit.target: Securely connect your app with resources in a private network using Point-To-Site VPN

trans-unit.source: Securely connect your app with resources in a private network using Hybrid Connections
trans-unit.target: Securely connect your app with resources in a private network using Hybrid Connections

trans-unit.source: Achieve security isolation for your apps using App Service Environments (ASE)
trans-unit.target: Achieve security isolation for your apps using App Service Environments (ASE)

trans-unit.source: Configure a Web Application Firewall (WAF) in front of your ASE
trans-unit.target: Configure a Web Application Firewall (WAF) in front of your ASE

trans-unit.source: Configure access control for inbound network traffic for your ASE
trans-unit.target: Configure access control for inbound network traffic for your ASE

trans-unit.source: Securely connect to backend resources from your ASE
trans-unit.target: Securely connect to backend resources from your ASE
